title: Soil Remediation at White Sands Test Facility
summary: NASA White Sands Test Facility Las Cruces, New Mexico Soil Remediation at the 600 Area Off-Site Pile Origins of the 600 Area Off-Site Pile NASA completes one more corrective action, removing and disposing of contaminated soil, eliminating exposure risks to human health and the environment.
